participant_1.background:
I enjoy spending time with my parents and friends, but also like to have time to myself to relax.
The weather is too hot for me, but I love the sunshine that it brings.
I've seen elephants on my travels, and they are amazing creatures.
I remember the feeling of pride I got from buying my first baseball glove.
My most valuable thing is the sense of accomplishment I get from making something special with my own hands.

participant_2.background:
I'm a night owl who prefers to sleep in and do my creative work at night.
my favorite food is cheeseburgers.
I hope that my comics will be published and that people will enjoy them.
I enjoy eating hummus and pita bread, but I am not very close to my family.
I love waking up to the sound of my dogs' excited barking.

content.text: Hi there! I am looking forward to chatting with you
Hey there! I am glad to meet you too
I am interested in hearing more about your creative work
I love to draw comics! I am hoping to publish them someday
That's awesome! What is your favorite kind of comic to draw?
I like to draw funny comics, but I also like to draw more serious comics
What is your favorite thing to draw?
I love to draw animals! I have a dog and a cat, and I also love elephants
I love animals too! I have a dog and a cat as well
That's great! What are their names?
My dog's name is Milo, and my cat's name is Luna
What kind of dog is Milo?
